add $t0, $t0, $t1
000000,01000,01001,01000,00000,010000

addi $t0, $t1, 100
001000,01001,01000,0000000001100100

addi $t0, $t1, -100
100001001010001111111110011100

sub $t0, $t0, $t1
000000,01000,01001,01000,00000,100010

sll $t0, $t1, 2
000000,00000,01001,01000,00010,000000
注意sll有一个特点

and $t0, $t1, $t2
000000,01001,01010,01000,00000,100100

or $t0, $t1, $t2
000000,01001,01010,01000,00000,100101

L1: add $t0, $t0, $t1
j L1
1000010010100000000100000
1000000100000000000000000000

jr $t0
1000000000000000000001000

lw $s4, 4($s3)
10001110011101000000000000000100

lw $s4, -4($s3)
10001110011101001111111111111100

sw $s0, 100($sp)
10101111101100000000000001100100

sw $s0, -100($sp)
10101111101100001111111110011100

L1: addi $t0, $t1, -100
beq $t0, $zero, L1
100001001010001111111110011100
10001000000001111111111111110

beq $t0, $zero, L1
L1: addi $t0, $t1, -100
100001001010001111111110011100
10001000000000000000000000000

L1: add $t0, $t1, $t2
addi $t1, $t1, 100
addi $t0, $t1, -100
sub $s0, $s1, $t1
beq $t0, $zero, L2
sll $a0, $a1, 2
and $t0, $t1, $t2
or $t0, $t1, $t2
j L1
L2: lw $s4, 4($s3)
sw $s0, -100($sp)
00000001001010100100000000100000
00100001001010010000000001100100
00100001001010001111111110011100
00000010001010011000000000100010
00010001000000000000000000000100
00000000000001010010000010000000
00000001001010100100000000100100
00000001001010100100000000100101
00001000000100000000000000000000
10001110011101000000000000000100
10101111101100001111111110011100
